api_list.name: /admin/logout
api_list.description: logouts the user from the system
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hiei23-usw-app-v1.p.rapidapi.com/admin/logout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hiei23-usw-app-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
